properties.entry: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE ( SD_NO , SD_TITLE , SD_PLACE , SD_SDATE , SD_EDATE , SD_DESCRIPTION , RANGE_NO , BGI_NO , SD_CDATE , SD_STATUS , M_NO , SD_HOWLONG ) VALUES ( SEQ_SD.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? )

AND SD_STATUS != 'D' ORDER BY SD_SDATE

UPDATE SCHEDULE SET SD_TITLE = ? , SD_SDATE = ? , SD_EDATE = ? , SD_HOWLONG = ? WHERE M_NO = ? AND SD_NO = ?
UPDATE SCHEDULE SET SD_STATUS = ? WHERE M_NO = ? AND SD_NO = ?
SELECT SD_NO , SD_TITLE , SD_PLACE , SD_SDATE , SD_EDATE , SD_DESCRIPTION , RANGE_NO , BGI_NO , SD_CDATE , SD_STATUS , SD_HOWLONG , M_NO , M_ID FROM SCHEDULE JOIN MEMBER USING (M_NO)
